mechanics.condition: Flickering flame is in caster's hand
mechanics.outcome: Sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet
Caster and their equipment are not harmed by the flame
Caster can dismiss the spell as an action

mechanics.condition: Another Produce Flame spell cast by the same caster is already active
mechanics.outcome: The previously active Produce Flame spell ends

mechanics.trigger: On casting this spell OR As an action on a later turn
mechanics.condition: A creature is within 30 feet of the caster
mechanics.outcome: Caster can hurl the flame at a creature, making a ranged spell attack

mechanics.trigger: Caster makes a ranged spell attack by hurling the flame
Ranged spell attack made with hurled flame hits a target

mechanics.condition: Caster reaches 5th level OR 11th level OR 17th level
mechanics.outcome: Damage dealt by the spell increases by 1d8 (2d8 at 5th, 3d8 at 11th, 4d8 at 17th)

description_text: A flickering flame appears in your hand. The flame remains there for the duration and harms neither you nor your equipment. The flame sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The spell ends if you dismiss it as an action or if you cast it again. You can also attack with the flame, although doing so ends the spell. When you cast this spell, or as an action on a later turn, you can hurl the flame at a creature within 30 feet of you. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 fire damage. This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).
